Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 11:41:56
Folder: CT28028 - visa renewal and em id
Message Count: 4

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CT28028_00
From: Ahmad Alhamawi <Ahmad.Alhamawi@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: Farah Awad <Farah.Awad@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2024-12-04 09:44
Subject: Visa Renewal and EM ID
--------------------------------------------------
Hello Hagop,

 

Hope you are doing well.

 

Kindly note that your visa will expire on 31 Mar 2025, and the normal process takes up to 3 working weeks, however, the VIP takes up to 10 working days with an extra cost of 1,100 AED.

 

Please find the below documents that are needed to initiate your visa renewal:

 

-scanned copy of a new studio photo as per attached new government regulations sent directly from the studio.

-scanned copy of your full eVisa page on your passport (not cropped).

-scanned copy of your full passport pages front & back (not cropped) .

-scanned copy of your insurance card

-Filled EIDA word document

- A Soft copy of your Emirates ID back and front.

 

Once received, we will initiate the process you can share them closer to the date.

 

Kindly confirm on how we shall proceed.

 

Regards, 

AHMAD ALHAMAWI​​​​

ASSOCIATE ‑ PEOPLE RELATIONS

REAL FZE JORDAN

AMMAN

‑

JORDAN

Please find the below documents that are needed to initiate your visa renewal:

chunks.text:
From: Ahmad Alhamawi
Sent: Wednesday, December 4, 2024 9:04 AM
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> >
Cc: Farah Awad <Farah.Awad@chalhoub.com <mailto:Farah.Awad@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: Visa Renewal and EM ID
Importance: High

 

Hello Hagop,

 

Hope you are doing well.

 

Kindly note that your visa will expire on 31 May 2025, and the normal process takes up to 3 working weeks, however, the VIP takes up to 10 working days with an extra cost of 1,100 AED.

 

Please find the below documents that are needed to initiate your visa renewal:

 

-scanned copy of a new studio photo as per attached new government regulations sent directly from the studio.

-scanned copy of your full eVisa page on your passport (not cropped).

-scanned copy of your full passport pages front & back (not cropped) .

-scanned copy of your insurance card

-Filled EIDA word document

- A Soft copy of your Emirates ID back and front.

 

Once received, we will initiate the process you can share them closer to the date.

 

Kindly confirm on how we shall proceed.

 

Regards,

AHMAD ALHAMAWI​​​​

ASSOCIATE ‑ PEOPLE RELATIONS

REAL FZE JORDAN

AMMAN

‑

JORDAN
